pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sites, Population, and Records Cleaning Skills // Data cleaning including 1) generating datasets for time-series and case- crossover analyses based on raw hospital records, 2) linking individuals to an areal map, 3) picking out cases living within a buffer of certain size surrounding a site, etc. For more information, please refer to Zhang W,etc. (2018) doi:10.1016/j.envpol.2018.08.030.
